languages.text: On hit, wielder's allies gain +1 AP, + {uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} MP and their attacks deal +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% additional Critical Hit Chance on their next turn. This bonus doesn't stack.

traits.locale_text: On hit, wielder's allies gain +1 AP, + {uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} MP and their attacks deal +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% additional Critical Hit Chance on their next turn. This bonus doesn't stack.

languages.text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.
languages.original_text: Когда персонаж попадает в союзника выстрелом из этого оружия, союзник получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Этот бонус не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder hits an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 AP, +{uip|MP|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} MP, and +{uip|Crit|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9}% critical hit chance during their next turn. This bonus does not stack.

Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi bu silahla bir dost birime {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} o dost birim; bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve +%{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Bu bonus üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi bu silahla bir dost birime vurduğunda o dost birim; bir sonraki turunda +1 EP, +{uip|MP|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} HP ve +%{uip|Crit|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} kritik vuruş olasılığı kazanır. Bu bonus üst üste birikmez.

Kullanan kişi bu silahla bir dost birime vurduğunda o dost birim; bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} +1 EP, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} HP ve +%{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Bu bonus üst üste birikmez.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}alcance{/g} a un aliado con esta arma, dicho aliado gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y un +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} % a su probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} durante su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Esta bonificación no es acumulativa.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador alcance a un aliado con esta arma, dicho aliado gana +1 PA, +{uip|MP|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} PM y un +{uip|Crit|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} % a su probabilidad de impacto crítico durante su próximo turno. Esta bonificación no es acumulativa.

languages.text: 当装备者使用这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}盟友时，被命中的盟友下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}、+{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}、+{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}%{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}。此加成效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用这把武器命中盟友时，被命中的盟友下个回合获得+1行动点数、+{uip|MP|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9}移动点数、+{uip|Crit|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9}%暴击率。此加成效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un allié avec cette arme, l'allié gagné +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} lors de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur touche un allié avec cette arme, l'allié gagné +1 PA, +{uip|MP|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} PD et +{uip|Crit|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} % de chances de coup critique lors de son prochain tour. Ce bonus n'est pas cumulable.

languages.text: 使用者がこの武器で味方を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}すると、その味方は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}+1、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}+{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカル率{/g}+{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}%される。このボーナスはスタックしない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がこの武器で味方を攻撃すると、その味方は次のターンの間AP+1、MP+{uip|MP|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9}、クリティカル率+{uip|Crit|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9}%される。このボーナスはスタックしない。
使用者がこの武器で味方を攻撃すると、その味方は次のターンの間AP+1、MP+{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}、クリティカル率+{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}%される。このボーナスはスタックしない。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} der Träger mit dieser Waffe einen Verbündeten, erhält dieser während seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}Kritische Trefferchance{/g}. Dieser Bonus ist nicht stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Trifft der Träger mit dieser Waffe einen Verbündeten, erhält dieser während seines nächsten Zuges +1 AP, +{uip|MP|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} BP und +{uip|Crit|7e6badfb8f874a359e7e6aae725f91d9} % Kritische Trefferchance. Dieser Bonus ist nicht stapelbar.

languages.text: Когда персонаж попадает в союзника выстрелом из этого оружия, союзник получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Этот бонус не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with this weapon, that ally gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} during their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This bonus does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж попадает в союзника выстрелом из этого оружия, союзник получает +1 ОД, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} ОП и +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% к шансу критического попадания в свой следующий ход. Этот бонус не суммируется.

Когда персонаж попадает в союзника выстрелом из этого оружия, союзник получает +1 ОД, +{uip|MP|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c} ОП и +{uip|Crit|e4e4fabc823f464e8b261ca68d33143c}% к шансу критического попадания в свой следующий ход. Этот бонус не суммируется.
